name: vite-shadcn-workspace
description: template for pnpm workspace with vite, react, typescript, tailwindcss, and shadcn

scripts.postshadcn: bash ./packages/react-ui/fix-shadcn-import-paths.sh && pnpm install && pnpm biome check --write packages/react-ui
scripts.reset: pnpm dlx rimraf --glob ./**/node_modules && pnpm dlx rimraf --glob ./**/dist
scripts.preflight: pnpm lint:fix && pnpm typecheck && pnpm test
scripts.deps:update: pnpm update -r -i && pnpm syncpack fix-mismatches && pnpm install && pnpm dedupe
scripts.deps:update:latest: pnpm update -r -i --latest && pnpm syncpack fix-mismatches && pnpm install && pnpm dedupe
scripts.workspace:ls: pnpm m ls --json --depth=-1 | node -e "const path = require('path'); console.log(JSON.parse(require('fs').readFileSync('/dev/stdin', 'utf-8')).map((m) => path.relative(__dirname, m.path)).filter(Boolean))"
scripts.kill:port: bash -c 'pids=$(lsof -i :$0 | grep LISTEN | awk "{print \$2}"); if [[ -z $pids ]]; then echo "No process found running on port $0"; else echo "Killing: $pids"; echo $pids | xargs kill; fi'
scripts.kill:vscode-server: ps uxa | grep .vscode-server | awk '{print $2}' | xargs kill
